product_name: TE-A-ME Chamomile Fruit and Flower Infusion, 25 Tea Bags (2 Flavored Bags Free): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: So here is the review:When you open up a packet of 'TE-A-ME' you will get that fresh flowery and fruity smell of chamomile which is very much soothing to the brain... The whole pack includes 25 infusion bags and 3 flavored bags...First I'll tell you about the flavor bags... I have got flavors of apple cinnamon, honey lemon green tea and a normal green tea.. You may have the green tea any time you want... It is basically for normal consumption... Honey lemon green tea can be consumed early in the morning when you crave for something a little stronger to kick away your sleep... It will really help you... Moreover if you exercise then it's really great for you to increase your metabolism... Consume it before your workout... And aahh! The apple cinnamon is so strong.. It is best when you are having a really hectic day and you want something really calming... It is the best option as it will give a good kick to your mind...Now let's talk about the chamomile infusion bags.. On being made, they are so fresh and flowery... It's like it can wake you up instantly or energize you anytime... I have made a habit of consuming this at night... After all the day's heavy work it relaxes you and calms you down... And since it doesn't contain any caffeine hence your sleep wouldn't be disturbed...

this is 100% chamomile teachamomile tea is not green tea,Chamomile tea is made of chamomile flowers which is a herb, so technically its a herbal teaits got various benefits like>>boost immunity>promotes sleep>reduces acneand many more. . . . .its a light tasting infusion tea, for new drinkers this could taste a bit off, but its health benefits outweigh the taste.the package also includes a few samples of various other tea variants from their brand ( all are good)overall experience was good.

reviews.review_title: What a wonderful gift of nature
reviews.review_body: Just get it, I have started drinking this since couple of days ago but oh my, the taste, aroma and effects are divine.Most definitely helps with insomnia and assists you with stress and anxiety.What a wonderful gift of nature!!Hail mother nature!

It have a little sweet taste similar to mulethi tea. Its totally unlike green tea so if you are looking for green tea type flavor then this is not the one to choose.It comes with a sample pack of their green tea and green tea mint flavor.With a tea bag can easily make two cups of tea.5 stars!

reviews.review_title: It’ okayish. It’s crushed very fined not that much flavour
reviews.review_body: I don’t know if it’s 100% flowers or not. It has mild sent but I am not sure if if I like it. It’s muddy yellow in colour, little dark for my expectations. Not very flavourful but ok. For the sleep and relaxation purpose, I didn’t find any particular changes in me. I received 25 bags plus two extra sample of their another range( I really liked lemon grass green tea sample, definitely gonna order that next time).

I started buying this when my anxiety started getting too much and I wasn't able to sleep even 3-4 hours each night. This worked like a charm and I started feeling relaxed and started sleeping better within a few days. Let it seep in a hot glass of water and sip it peacefully before you go to bed at night. The added bonus are the free samples they provide in each pack.Now this is a regular for me.

reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend. All scent and no flavor.
reviews.review_body: I ordered this after reading the review. The packaging and scent was all perfect. But the taste wasn't very good. It was like drinking prefumy water. I didn't find it tasty at all. It was somewhat a bitter flavor.

Most soothing to drink at the end of a long day, as a means of winding down, before bedtime. Absolutely wonderful. add a dash of honey to make it even more soothing. I enjoy it year round - summer or winter.
